Corporate Training Solutions Designed for Organizational Success

Our corporate training solutions uniquely combine project management expertise and intelligent business solutions to enable your entire team to win in this competitive environment.

World-Class Instructors

Our world-class instructors will help you improve your productivity, communication, execution, risk management and improve the bottom line.

Tailored Programs

Our tailored programs focus on improving business success by teaching your entire team. Let us help you and your organization achieve a culture of success!

Breadth of Course Offerings

From fundamentals to exam prep boot camps, our expansive course catalog outlines the 35+ courses we can tailor to your needs across Project Management, Agile, Business Analysis, Business Management, and Leadership skills development.

View Course Catalog Contact Sales

"After utilizing several organizations, there is no doubt in my mind that PMA is the standard and I would be proud to be affiliated with such an organization..." [ Read More ]

Mark F.

How Our Corporate Training Programs are Priced

Corporate training solutions are priced based on the type of training you want, number of students, and overall duration of your training program.

COURSE CATALOG

View Course Catalog
Estimate how many students will be taking the class

Whether your entire organization could benefit from training, or just a specialized subset of employees, we can put together a training solution to meet your needs.

Decide which dates you would like class to run

Durations can be flexible with many courses. However, for some certification courses, there are minimum hour requirements that must be met.

Contact Sales

Popular Corporate Training Solutions

We can customize programs to meet any company’s training and development needs. These are our most popular enterprise training programs.

PMP® Certification Training

Best for organizations who want their project managers to earn the PMP credential

What Students Will Learn:

Critical concepts, tools & techniques, and key terminology

Understand A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide) - Sixth Edition process groups and knowledge areas

Application of best practices when leading and managing a project

Calculate and apply essential formulas

Complete understanding of how to take the PMP Exam

Contact Sales

PM Foundations

Best for organizations who want to get their project managers up to speed on project management fundamentals

What Students Will Learn:

Initiating & planning how to manage the project

Detailed project planning

Executing the plan

Monitoring & controlling

Closing the project or phase

Contact Sales

PMI-ACP® Certification Training

Best for organizations who want their project managers to learn the principles and practices of Agile and/or earn the PMI-ACP credential

What Students Will Learn:

Core terminology, principles and practices of Agile

Key elements of the most popular approaches such as Scrum, Lean and XP

Anticipation and adaption techniques for changing customer needs

Effective deployment of Agile tactics to improve quality, reduce defects and accelerate delivery

Complete understanding of how to take the PMI-ACP Exam

Contact Sales

FAQs

Does my program have to run on consecutive days, or can I spread it out?

We are very flexible and make sure to work closely with you and your team to meet your needs. We can deliver our programs on consecutive days as well as spread it out based on instructor availability.

How far out do I need details confirmed?

We would like to have all details at least 30 days out to make sure we are able to ship all the materials needed and assign an instructor to your course. The sooner the better, especially for assigning an instructor to your course.

Our legal team is strict, can we send over our own contract?

We can accept a signed proposal or take the PO route as a confirmation of your course. We are happy to provide you with all the needed documentation to set us up as vendors to get a PO issued. We can also share your contract with our legal department, but it must have our terms & conditions as well.

Can you do any of the courses virtually?

Yes, we have the flexibility of delivering our courses live or live/virtual format. We have done this for dispersed teams, as well as for some of our international customers, and are happy to work with you to make sure your needs are met.

Do you only charge per student or do you offer day rates?

We offer both. We can be flexible with the minimum students required for an in-house course as long as we meet our minimum daily pricing threshold.

Is the instructor T and E included in your pricing?

Yes, our quoted price includes the instructor T & E.

Do we still need to pay for the PMI test or is the test fee included?

The test fee is not included as we are not the certifying body. You can register to become a PMI member. It costs $159 to become a member, but it saves you money on exam fees. The standard non-member price to take the exam is $675. The PMI member price for the exam is $425.

Do you have online support?

All courses come with access to our online portal. For many of our courses, you can find the whole course in pre-recorded format, practice exams, flash cards, as well as access to tutoring webinars to help students get prepared for test day if they are taking a certification exam.

Is the instructor an expert?

Yes, we pride ourselves on having the best instructors with experience in various industries with years of project management experience. All our instructors go through a strict vetting process.

NEED HELP?

Tell us what you are looking for.
